data.persona: I am provided a special place to sleep. I may be tired after my travels. I am furnished with warm hospitality and a good meal.
data.description:
You are in the The grand dining room.
The grand dining room has a gold plated dome in the ceiling with mosaic pieces creating an intricate art form. There are five chandeliers made of china hung from the ceiling and a hand carved 30 person kings dining table in the center of the room with a hand woven rug underneath it.
There's a gold plated dome, a the palace, a chandelier, a hand carved 30 person kings dining table, and a hand woven rug here.
The the king's mother who sits at their side. and the the king are here.

You are carrying a Handkerchief and a purse, and wearing a ceremonial hat.
data.goal: give purse to the king's mother who sits at their side.

data.short_motivation: I have to fetch the king's mother's purse to be polite.
data.mid_motivation: I have been invited to dinner with the king today.
data.long_motivation: I want to have stories of my travels recorded in the royal library.
